BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #1099 from lukzeg/feature/update-protractor-tests [#1098]Update protractor jasmine tests

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix for stdout race condition in stf doctor Sometimes the process exits before the data is read from stdout. The result is that the `call` method exits before it has it's output. Example bug: https://github.com/openstf/stf/issues/1091
